title: Net Promoter Score Survey
description: Measure customer loyalty and satisfaction with a standardized NPS survey

intro.title: Your Opinion Matters
intro.description: Thank you for participating in our Net Promoter Score survey. Your feedback helps us understand how we're doing and how we can improve.

nps_score.title: How likely are you to recommend our company/product to a friend or colleague?
nps_score.description: Please select a number from 0 to 10, where 0 is 'Not at all likely' and 10 is 'Extremely likely'

nps_explanation.title: What is the primary reason for your score?
nps_explanation.description: Please explain why you gave this rating

nps_categories.title: Understanding Your Score
nps_categories.description:
Based on your score:
• 0-6: Detractors - Customers who might impede growth through negative word-of-mouth
• 7-8: Passives - Satisfied but unenthusiastic customers
• 9-10: Promoters - Loyal enthusiasts who fuel growth

additional_feedback.title: Additional Feedback
additional_feedback.description: Is there anything else you'd like to share about your experience with us?

thank_you.title: Thank You!
thank_you.description: We appreciate your feedback. Your input helps us improve our products and services.
